dublinCore.dc:title: 117 HR 6417 IH: Ending Importation of Laundered Russian Oil Act
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Doggett (for himself, Mr. Wilson of South Carolina, Mr. Bacon, Mr. Fitzpatrick, Mr. Smith of New Jersey, Mrs. Spartz, Mrs. Radewagen, Mr. Pallone, Mr. Goldman of New York, Mr. Schiff, Mr. Blumenauer, Ms. Titus, Mr. Raskin, Mr. Huffman, Mr. Vargas, Mr. Cohen, Ms. Dean of Pennsylvania, Ms. Sewell, Mr. Khanna, Mr. Carson, Mr. Sherman, Ms. McClellan, Ms. Norton, Mr. Lynch, Mr. Deluzio, Mr. Cleaver, Mr. Costa, Mr. Garamendi, Mr. McGovern, Mr. Pascrell, Mr. Landsman, Mr. Johnson of Georgia, Ms. Schakowsky, Mr. Green of Texas, Mr. Swalwell, Mr. Evans, Ms. Crockett, Ms. Lee of California, Mr. Gottheimer, Mr. Thompson of California, Mr. Quigley, Mr. Magaziner, Mr. Payne, Mr. Ruppersberger, Mr. Morelle, Ms. Moore of Wisconsin, Mr. Lamborn, Ms. Stevens, Ms. Meng, Mr. Nadler, Mr. Norcross, and Mr. Tonko) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means, and in addition to the Committee on Rules, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned

form.official-title: To amend the Ending Importation of Russian Oil Act to provide for a prohibition on importation of energy products produced at refineries outside the Russian Federation.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Ending Importation of Laundered Russian Oil Act.

section.header: Prohibition on importation of energy products produced at refineries outside the Russian Federation

subsection.text: The Ending Importation of Russian Oil Act (Public Law 117–109; 136 Stat. 1154) is amended—

paragraph.text: by redesignating section 3 as section 4; and
by inserting after section 2 the following:

section.header: Prohibition on importation of energy products produced at refineries outside the Russian Federation
section.text: All products classified under chapter 27 of the Harmonized Tariff Schedule that were produced at any refinery that uses crude oil originating in the Russian Federation shall be banned from importation into the United States.

subsection.text: Section 4 of the Ending Importation of Russian Oil Act (Public Law 117–109; 136 Stat. 1154), as redesignated by subsection (a)(1), is amended—

paragraph.text: in subsection (a), by inserting or 3 after section 2; and
in subsection (c)(1), by inserting or 3 after section 2.
